workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.4912443303164273 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.2104095086767372 --weight-decay 0.0007077807241703837 --lr 9.117307128877747e-05 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 45246 --max-lr 0.0002517382455010258 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.1924683281325852 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.041362820445182094 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
